txt.en: With NÃºrzum drowned and the forces of Isengard somewhat cowed, the people of Wildermore can finally begin to pick up the pieces...with your help.

'Are you looking for some work to do towards the recovery and rebuilding of Wildermore? There is much to be done, and the people of this land need all the help they can get.

'Check the listings posted in the town centre of Forlaw for tasks that need doing. They change every day, so look back often!

'We'll gladly accept assistance on up to five listings every day.'

'Are you looking for some work to do towards the recovery and rebuilding of Wildermore? There is much to be done, and the people of this land need all the help they can get.

'Check the listings posted in the town centre of Forlaw for tasks that need doing. They change every day, so look back often!

'We'll gladly accept assistance on up to five listings every day.'
'You can find things to do by speaking to the people gathered here in the town square of Forlaw.'
Quest listings can be found posted throughout the centre of Forlaw.\n\nYou should check the listings and select the five quests you'd like to complete in order to fulfill this task.
